question.text: Can you change the position of the vehicle if you are involved in an accident?

answer.label: A
answer.text: yes, after you gave first aid to the victims

answer.label: B
answer.text: yes, if the accident only had material damages

answer.label: C
answer.text: yes, after announcing the police

question.text: Which traffic sign indicates that you have priority?
In which order will the vehicles pass the intersection?

answer.label: A
answer.text: motorcycle, lorry, car

answer.label: B
answer.text: motorcycle, car, lorry

answer.label: C
answer.text: lorry, motorcylce, car

question.text: The people injured with multiple burns on their bodies as a result of an accident must be:

answer.label: A
answer.text: rapidly stripped out of they clothes, after putting the flames out

answer.label: B
answer.text: urgently transported to a hospital

answer.label: C
answer.text: washed, bandaged and then transported to the nearest medical facility

question.text: What indicated this traffic sign?

answer.label: A
answer.text: Priority road

answer.label: B
answer.text: Parking prohibited

answer.label: C
answer.text: It's not a valid road sign

question.text: Which is the recommended speed on a road covered by mud or snow?

answer.label: A
answer.text: with no more than 20 km/h

answer.label: B
answer.text: the speed mentioned by the reglementations of the type of road you are driving on

answer.label: C
answer.text: a speed that can confer you the safety that you can stop and avoid any accident

question.text: When leaving residential or pedestrian areas, you are required to give priority to:

answer.label: A
answer.text: the motor vehicles

answer.label: B
answer.text: the pedestrians on the opposite way of travel

answer.label: C
answer.text: all vehicles which you encounter path with

question.text: At an unguided intersection of a national road with a country road, communal or local road, the right of way is granted to:

answer.label: A
answer.text: the vehicles traveling on the national road

answer.label: B
answer.text: the vehicles coming from the right

answer.label: C
answer.text: the vehicles travelling on the country, communal or local road

question.text: The airbag provides:

answer.label: A
answer.text: rapid cushioning of vibration caused by bumps on the public road

answer.label: B
answer.text: additional protection of persons in the event of a vehicle impact

answer.label: C
answer.text: he possibility of relaxed driving, with head resting on it

question.text: It is allowed to tow a vehicle on the highway?

answer.label: B
answer.text: yes, if the assembly so formed can exceed the speed of 50km/h

answer.label: C
answer.text: yes, if the towed vehicle is a car

question.text: When leaving residential or pedestrian areas, you are required to give priority to:

answer.label: A
answer.text: the motor vehicles

answer.label: B
answer.text: the pedestrians on the opposite way of travel

answer.label: C
answer.text: all vehicles which you encounter path with

question.text: At an unguided intersection of a national road with a country road, communal or local road, the right of way is granted to:

answer.label: A
answer.text: the vehicles traveling on the national road

answer.label: B
answer.text: the vehicles coming from the right

answer.label: C
answer.text: the vehicles travelling on the country, communal or local road

question.text: The airbag provides:

answer.label: A
answer.text: rapid cushioning of vibration caused by bumps on the public road

answer.label: B
answer.text: additional protection of persons in the event of a vehicle impact

answer.label: C
answer.text: he possibility of relaxed driving, with head resting on it

question.text: It is allowed to tow a vehicle on the highway?

answer.label: B
answer.text: yes, if the assembly so formed can exceed the speed of 50km/h

answer.label: C
answer.text: yes, if the towed vehicle is a car

question.text: What indicated this traffic sign?

answer.label: A
answer.text: Priority road

answer.label: B
answer.text: Parking prohibited

answer.label: C
answer.text: It's not a valid road sign

answer.label: A

question.text: Which traffic sign indicates that you have priority?
In which order will the vehicles pass the intersection?

answer.label: A
answer.text: motorcycle, lorry, car

answer.label: B
answer.text: motorcycle, car, lorry

answer.label: C
answer.text: lorry, motorcylce, car

question.text: The people injured with multiple burns on their bodies as a result of an accident must be:

answer.label: A
answer.text: rapidly stripped out of they clothes, after putting the flames out

answer.label: B
answer.text: urgently transported to a hospital

answer.label: C
answer.text: washed, bandaged and then transported to the nearest medical facility
